#Text=Charles Kennedy , former Liberal Democrats leader , dies aged 55
#Text=Thursday , June 4 , 2015
#Text=The Right Honorable Charles Kennedy , pictured in 2009Image : Moniker42 .
#Text=Charles Kennedy
#Text=, British former Member of Parliament who once led the Liberal Democrats , has died at age 55 .
#Text=He was found dead on Monday at his home in Fort William , Scotland by his partner , Carole Macdonald .
#Text=Kennedy was a Member of Parliament for 32 years , losing his seat in the 2015 general election to the Scottish National Party just under a month ago .
#Text=He led the Liberal Democrats from 1999 until his resignation in 2006 .
#Text=Kennedy first became a Member of Parliament in 1983 at age 23 , becoming the youngest MP at the time .
#Text=He was elected to represent the Ross , Cromarty and Skye constituency under the Social Democratic Party ( SDP ) .
#Text=Through this he helped the party eventually merge with the Liberal Party to form the Liberal Democrats in 1988 .
#Text=He took over leadership of the party in 1999 , replacing Paddy Ashdown .
#Text=During his time as party leader he won praise from critics for his opposition to the invasion of Iraq , which was being pushed through by then British Prime Minister Tony Blair .
#Text=In the 2005 general election he saw his party record their highest ever electoral result , winning 62 seats .
#Text=However his success would n't last , with Kennedy resigning the following year after going public with his alcohol abuse problem .
#Text=Tributes have come from politicians across a number of political parties .
#Text=The first edition of Prime Minister 's Questions since the general election took place in the House of Commons yesterday and many offered their condolences to Kennedy 's family .
#Text=Current Prime Minister David Cameron said " Charles Kennedy played a pivotal role in bringing together two parties — the SDP and the Liberals .

#Text=, the outgoing leader of the Liberal Democrats , said Kennedy  would have wanted to be remembered as a kind and loving father , brother and son first ; and an accomplished politician second " .

column1: #Text=Speaker
#Text=of the House John Bercow said to the House , " Charles Kennedy spent almost his entire adult life as an MP .

#Text=The SNP ' s Ian Blackford , who defeated Kennedy in the general election , said  So sorry to hear the dreadful news that Charles Kennedy had passed away .
